hibernate-mapping.query: from com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.ClassGrade classGrade where classGrade.grade.gradeId = ? and classGrade.schoolClass.classId = ?

SELECT distinct(classGrade) FROM com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.ClassGrade classGrade, com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.ClassTeacher classTeacher, com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.SubjectTeacher subjectTeacher, com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.GradeSubject gradeSubject, com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.Staff staff WHERE ( (classGrade.classGradeId = classTeacher.classGrade.classGradeId AND staff.staffId = classTeacher.staff.staffId AND classTeacher.year = ?) OR (classGrade.schoolClass.classId = subjectTeacher.schoolClass.classId AND subjectTeacher.gradeSubject.gradeSubjectId = gradeSubject.gradeSubjectId AND classGrade.grade.gradeId = gradeSubject.grade.gradeId AND staff.staffId = subjectTeacher.staff.staffId AND subjectTeacher.year = ?) ) AND staff.registrationNo = ?
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT ct.staff_id FROM CLASS_GRADE classGrade INNER JOIN CLASS_TEACHER ct ON ct.class_grade_Id = classGrade.class_grade_Id INNER JOIN STAFF staff ON staff.staff_id = ct.staff_id INNER JOIN USER_LOGIN ul ON ul.USER_IDENTIFICATION_NO = staff.REGISTRATION_NO WHERE staff.STAFF_ID = ? AND classGrade.class_grade_Id = ?
